channel.title: nostalgia on 阿波尔的博客

item.title: clan old photos
item.description: Before I get to that, let me introduce: Some of these photos are from the last century 1940s, and some are from the 70s and 80s. . . have a father, my father’s brothers and sisters, children and his elders in the photo. Did you know? A photo means the past of the elders, and a microcosm of that era.🤔 No one can stay young forever, but photos can stay.
